turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm trying to order some pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i could help you with that. could you tell me what you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I would like three medium pizzas, all gluten-free crust, one veggie lover's, and two pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You said 3 medium pizzas, all with gluten free crust, 1 veggie lovers, and 2 pepperoni pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $36.44 is the total for your order. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. the order has been placed. it'll be ready for pick up in 25 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need my help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. Thank you very much.
